name: American English Speaking
description: This useful app contains a lot of English lessons that will help you improve listening and speaking abilities. All lessons of this app are in American accent. You can also read the full transcript of each lesson while listening to the audios. Features: - Audios and Transcripts of over 200 English Lessons: listening lessons and daily conversations (American English); - Vocabulary Learning; - Hangman game; - Offline Audio.
